response.overview: Dreamer's Holiday was created by river guide and filmmaker Don Briggs as a promotional video for Arizona Raft Adventures' trips down the Colorado River in the 1980s. Boaters and their passengers raft through smooth waters and brave various rapids while taking breaks along various side canyons. They hike trails, climb rock formations, cook meals and eat along the shores, dive and swim, mudbathe, read poetry, and compete in volleyball amidst the giant walls of Grand Canyon.
response.title: Dreamers Holiday
